title: Awesome SEO
description: A curated list of SEO tools

tools.name: AHrefs
tools.description: Backlinks searcher and SEO reporter.

tools.name: Applinks Documentation
tools.description: Use meta tags to create deep links for your apps.

tools.name: Buzzsumo
tools.description: Analyze which content performs best for any topic or competition.

tools.name: ContentStudio
tools.description: Discover niche-relevant content and share it on your social media channels.

tools.name: Diretrizes para Webmasters
tools.description: Google guidelines for webmasters.

tools.name: FAQ Schema Generator
tools.description: Instantly generate FAQ structured data to improve your click-through rate.

tools.name: Google Mobile Friendly Test
tools.description: Test your site’s mobile compatibility according to Google.

tools.name: Google PageSpeed Insights
tools.description: Test your website's performance and get optimization tips.

tools.name: Google Rich Results Test
tools.description: Test your microdata markup and see examples.

tools.name: GTMetrix
tools.description: Measure your site’s Page Load Time, Total Page Size, and Total Requests.

tools.name: JSON-LD Schema Markup Generator
tools.description: A utility to build schema markup using JSON-LD.

tools.name: Keywordtool.io
tools.description: Keyword search tool for Google, YouTube, App Store, and Bing.

tools.name: Loader.io
tools.description: Cloud-based load testing.

tools.name: Open Graph Debugger
tools.description: Debug Open Graph metadata.

tools.name: Open Graph Protocol
tools.description: Meta tags protocol used by Facebook.

tools.name: Open Link Profiler
tools.description: Discover who is creating backlinks to your site.

tools.name: OptimalUX
tools.description: Real-time SEO patching and A/B testing for flawless web experiments.

tools.name: Raven Tools
tools.description: SEO software focused on site audits and rank tracking.

tools.name: Schema.org Full List Documentation
tools.description: Full list of schema.org recipes for implementing structured data.

tools.name: Screaming Frog SEO Spider
tools.description: Industry-leading website crawler for technical SEO audits.

tools.name: SearchAttention
tools.description: Optimize your content for AI Search Engines like Google AI Overview, Perplexity or SearchGPT.

tools.name: SemRush
tools.description: Comprehensive tool for analyzing website keywords.

tools.name: Seobility
tools.description: All-in-one SEO software including crawler, rank tracker, backlink checker, and reporting tools.

tools.name: SimilarWeb
tools.description: Discover your world rank and get information about traffic and referrals.

tools.name: Ubersuggest
tools.description: Free SEO tool specializing in generating keyword ideas.

tools.name: WebPageTest
tools.description: Test your website’s performance and loading speed.

tools.name: Woorank
tools.description: Tests your website according to more than 70 SEO criteria.
